name: Country Inns & Suites By Carlson San Jose

reviews.text: Very convenient to the international airport. Luxury at a great price. Very friendly staff and helpful. Close to a mall and many restaurants. Direct access to the main highway. Easy to find.
reviews.title: Comfortable and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I've stayed here several times on business and have held meetings here. The areas are very spacious and private.
reviews.title: good place to start and end

reviews.text: No reason to stay anywhere else.
reviews.title: Excellent value and location. I will stay here again!

reviews.text: we stayed here for 2 nights at both the beginning and the end of our Imagine Latin America tour of Costa Rica. The hotel was perfectly adequate and was in a great location close to the airport but with no airport noise. We did a couple of trips from here (coffee plantation and volcanos and la Paz) and seemed to always be dropped back first - always a bonus :) ) Breakfast was buffet style and plentiful but didn't have anything else to eat at the hotel as we went down the road to where there are a few restaurants inc. mexican and italian (these being good for the end of the trip when you have had enough of rice and beans!). On our second stay I asked for a room with a balcony or terrace for outdoor access and were put in one of the suite rooms which was much bigger and had a nicer bathroom than our first room so worth an ask ;). We also had a breakfast delivered to our room the night before our early departure, which we didn't have to ask for, so that was a nice touch. So, in summary, a perfectly adequate mid-range hotel in a good location
reviews.title: Housekeepers are Thieves!!!

reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect after reading reviews, but I am so glad I booked my stay here. Very close to the airport. Very good value- big room with balcony, excellent restaurant which was very reasonably-priced. There is a casino just down the street, too. I walked to the nearby convenience store for water, beverages and snacks. A wonderful family-owned souvenir shop is just steps beyond that- my family's favorite souvenirs were purchased there- at very reasonable prices. There is a mall just down the road, but I used the hotel shuttle to go back and forth. I had the best manicure of my life there! My cuticles never looked better.
reviews.title: Freezing Pool, Salmonella, and Deliberate Deception! Whoo-hoo!

reviews.text: We had two separate stays here, both one night after and before a flight. The hotel is located about 10 minutes by car from the airport. They have a complimentary shuttle but with very limited hours.
reviews.title: Good hotel but scamming practices

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room we got (I think we were upgraded as Club Carlson gold members) were big and decent. They all faced the courtyard where there are two pools. Both of the rooms had big balconies with chairs. Breakfast was very good for the price.
reviews.title: Good Start to our Costa Rica trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For our last stay we had to check out at 05 in the morning and the night before asked the hotel if they could help arrange a taxi. The hotel agreed to this and said it would cost USD 18 for our private transportation. We thought this was expensive but agreed to it (normal taxi is much less).
reviews.title: Reliable Clean Stay

reviews.text: The next morning our taxi (the hotel shuttle) was about 10 minutes late and they asked us if another guy could ride with us. We gladly accepted this and during the ride the guy told us his company was paying for the shuttle. Even so (and the shuttle driver gave the guy a receipt) we had to pay $18 for our private shared shuttle...
reviews.title: Great spot for pre-flight comforts!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All in all I would have rated this hotel 4/5 had it not been for our shuttle experience.
reviews.title: Hotel worth staying in

reviews.text: I stayed at the Country Inn and Suites for two nights, before attending a conference in another city in Costa Rica. It is less than 15 minutes away from the international airport and they offer a shuttle service to and from the airport. You do need to confirm your travel times with the front desk.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay
Good and Inexpensive
reviews.text: My room was large, clean and the bed wonderfully comfortable. The courtyard and pool were a pleasant surprise, clean and well maintained. I really enjoyed all the greenery and flowers around the hotel property. I found all the staff very friendly, polite and helpful.
The complimentary buffet breakfast served in the restaurant on site is quite good and I loved all the fresh fruit!
reviews.title: Nice hotel with a great shuttle service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel offers free internet at a fairly decent speed.
reviews.title: Hotel is ok, location is both good and bad

reviews.text: Some other info you might find useful:
reviews.title: Luxurious Accommodations!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a recent trip, my husband and I rented a car and started out for our destination. Unfortunately, our GPS sent us up over the mountains on one lane dirt roads when we just needed to get across San Jose to Cartago. We eventually ended up back at the airport, frustrated with nerves that had seen better days, and found the Country Inn & Suites. We checked into our room which was very nice, just off the pool area. We then went back to the front desk to see if we could get some directions to help us the next day. The front desk clerk, Juan Pablo I believe was his name, was so helpful. He found a business in Cartago and programmed it into the GPS. We arose early the following morning to beat the traffic and made our way through the city with no problems.
reviews.title: Very Helpful

reviews.text: The room was quite adequate and the pool area beautiful. It was also quiet and spacious considering how close to the road and airport this hotel is. We had a couple of drinks in the bar/restaurant area that evening which was quite nice. The following morning we had breakfast before leaving and it was a good way to start the day.
reviews.title: Clean , friendly airport close to airport

reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this hotel 5 stars was the toilet in our room flushed slowly, then overflowed the following morning. We reported the problem. I imagine it was resolved because the grounds were so well maintained and the room and public areas very clean.
reviews.title: Perfectly adequate airport hotel - no surprises

reviews.text: Very good value , clean rooms, friendly staff, close to many amenities and 15 minutes to airport.
reviews.title: great hotel by the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Try to book newly renovated room as some are surprisingly nice.
reviews.title: Good hotel for first night
